text: Kiran Bedi (born 9 June 1949) is a retired Indian Police Service officer, and former tennis player . She is the former Lieutenant Governor of Puducherry. She is the first female Indian Police Service (IPS) officer. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:20th-century Indian writers Category:Lieutenant Governors of Puducherry Category:21st-century Indian writers
title: Kiran Bedi
